--- select_literals_bytes.sql
SELECT
  B"abc",
  B'''abc''',
  b"""abc""",
  b"""abc\n""",
  br'abc+',
  RB"abc+",
  RB'''abc''',
  RB'''abc\n''',
  B"\000",
  B"\077\077\077"

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   9,
          end:   15,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   19,
          end:   29,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   33,
          end:   43,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   47,
          end:   59,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x0a,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   63,
          end:   71,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x2b,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   75,
          end:   83,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x2b,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   87,
          end:   98,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   102,
          end:   115,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x61, 0x62, 0x63, 0x5c, 0x6e,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   119,
          end:   126,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x00,
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.BytesLiteral{
          pos:   130,
          end:   145,
          Value: []uint8{
            0x3f, 0x3f, 0x3f,
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*parser.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT B"abc", B"abc", B"abc", B"abc\n", B"abc+", B"abc+", B"abc", B"abc\\n", B"\x00", B"\?\?\?"
